languages.text: {n}Беззлобно улыбнувшись, Джай с искренней теплотой произносит:{/n} "Если твое сердце ясно видит, где лежит твое счастье, то я радуюсь за тебя и славлю Великого".
{n}Smiling without enmity, Jae says with genuine warmth,{/n} "If your heart sees clearly where its delight lies, all I can do is be glad for you and praise the Exalted One."
languages.original_text: {n}Беззлобно улыбнувшись, Джай с искренней теплотой произносит:{/n} "Если твое сердце ясно видит, где лежит твое счастье, то я радуюсь за тебя и славлю Великого".

languages.text: {n}恨んだ様子もなくジェイは笑い、偽りのない温かさで言う。{/n}「{name}様の気持ちがどこに向いているのかはっきり分かってるなら、あたしは{name}様のために嬉しいと思うし、エグザルテッド・ワンを称えるよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling without enmity, Jae says with genuine warmth,{/n} "If your heart sees clearly where its delight lies, all I can do is be glad for you and praise the Exalted One."

traits.locale_text: {n}恨んだ様子もなくジェイは笑い、偽りのない温かさで言う。{/n}「{name}様の気持ちがどこに向いているのかはっきり分かってるなら、あたしは{name}様のために嬉しいと思うし、エグザルテッド・ワンを称えるよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊笑了起来，笑容中没有任何敌意。她以真诚而温暖的语气开了口。{/n}“既然你的心已经找到了真正的幸福，我所能做的只有为你感到高兴，赞美至高无上的神皇。”
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling without enmity, Jae says with genuine warmth,{/n} "If your heart sees clearly where its delight lies, all I can do is be glad for you and praise the Exalted One."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊笑了起来，笑容中没有任何敌意。她以真诚而温暖的语气开了口。{/n}“既然你的心已经找到了真正的幸福，我所能做的只有为你感到高兴，赞美至高无上的神皇。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Avec un sourire dénué d'animosité, Jae déclare d'un ton bienveillant :{/n} « Si votre cœur distingue clairement l'objet de son affection, c'est que l'Exalté l'a voulu ainsi et je m'en réjouis pour vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling without enmity, Jae says with genuine warmth,{/n} "If your heart sees clearly where its delight lies, all I can do is be glad for you and praise the Exalted One."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un sourire dénué d'animosité, Jae déclare d'un ton bienveillant :{/n} « Si votre cœur distingue clairement l'objet de son affection, c'est que l'Exalté l'a voulu ainsi et je m'en réjouis pour vous. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae sonríe sin enemistad y, con una calidez sincera, declara:{/n} «Si su corazón tiene claro el camino a seguir, solo me queda alegrarme por usted y alabar al Exaltado».
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling without enmity, Jae says with genuine warmth,{/n} "If your heart sees clearly where its delight lies, all I can do is be glad for you and praise the Exalted One."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae sonríe sin enemistad y, con una calidez sincera, declara:{/n} «Si su corazón tiene claro el camino a seguir, solo me queda alegrarme por usted y alabar al Exaltado».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae lächelt ohne Feindseligkeit und sagt mit echter Wärme:{/n} "Wenn Euer Herz klar erblickt, wo seine Freude liegt, kann ich mich nur mit Euch freuen und den Erhabenen preisen."
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling without enmity, Jae says with genuine warmth,{/n} "If your heart sees clearly where its delight lies, all I can do is be glad for you and praise the Exalted One."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae lächelt ohne Feindseligkeit und sagt mit echter Wärme:{/n} "Wenn Euer Herz klar erblickt, wo seine Freude liegt, kann ich mich nur mit Euch freuen und den Erhabenen preisen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Hiçbir husumet barındırmadan gülümseyen Jae, içtenlikle konuşuyor.{/n} "Yüreğin sevincinin nerede saklı olduğunu açıkça görebiliyorsa benim tek yapabileceğim, senin için mutlu olup Görkemli'ye şükürlerimi sunmaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}Smiling without enmity, Jae says with genuine warmth,{/n} "If your heart sees clearly where its delight lies, all I can do is be glad for you and praise the Exalted One."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hiçbir husumet barındırmadan gülümseyen Jae, içtenlikle konuşuyor.{/n} "Yüreğin sevincinin nerede saklı olduğunu açıkça görebiliyorsa benim tek yapabileceğim, senin için mutlu olup Görkemli'ye şükürlerimi sunmaktır."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
